snippet: The decision involving the settlements highlighted the fragility of the Washington-brokered effort to resume peace negotiations.
abstract: Israeli cabinet's decision to add a number of Jewish settlements in the West Bank draws condemnation from the Palestinian leadership, highlighting the fragility of Washington-brokered effort to resume long-stalled negotiations.
lead_paragraph: The decision involving the settlements highlighted the fragility of the Washington-brokered effort to resume peace negotiations.

headline.main: Israeli Decree on West Bank Settlements Will Harm Peace Talks, Palestinians Say
headline.print_headline: Israeli Decree on West Bank Settlements Will Harm Peace Talks, Palestinians Say
